image module¶

image_utilities¶

py_utilities.image.image_utilities.aspect_ratio(size)[source]¶

Returns the aspect ratio of a size tuple

>>> aspect_ratio((800, 600))
(4, 3)

>>> aspect_ratio((800, 400))
(2, 1)

>>> aspect_ratio((2, 1))
(2, 1)
